WorkItem.ClosedComment: The information was solely a tooltip thing provided for ease of access. I've changed the tooltip to remove the parts about sunder and ff. I've left arms and mace spec
WorkItem.Description:
The DPSWarr Armor Penetration tooltip is current as follows:
 
@"Base Stats:Armor Penetration*Rating to Cap with buffs/debuffs applied
1232-None
1074-Sndr
1039-Sndr+FF
0916-Sndr+FF+Arms
0731-Sndr+FF+Arms+Mace"
 
As per the discussion here http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=58125 the cap does not change with the debuffs applied.
The tooltip should be moddified to present the correct data.
